availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Hatton (Bath County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Son of Marcus Hatton and Mary Hatton. Married to Mary Warren Hatton in Bath County, Kentucky, on May 24, 1859. Farm hand in Bath County in 1860. Served in the 24th Kentucky Infantry as a private from December 31, 1861, to January 31, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X

Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 174.
